column4: Is there any way to make a shortcut to the "www" directory on Apache? After going to the directory (var/www), and right clicking on the folder, the "Get Link" option is nulled out. How might I go about putting a link to the www directory on my desktop?
open a terminal and type 'ln -s /var/www www' in your home directory
when you say "in your home directory", what are you referring to?
